explains: v. 超过，超出；超越（限制）；优于，胜过

sentences.en: It is dangerous to exceed the recommended dose.
sentences.cn: 超过建议使用的剂量会有危险。

sentences.en: Your intake of alcohol should not exceed two units per day.
sentences.cn: 你每天酒精摄入量不能超过两个单位。

sentences.en: You risk incurring bank charges if you exceed your overdraft limit.
sentences.cn: 如果超出了透支限额，就有被银行加收费用的风险。
